item.title: CVE-2021-35228|2024-08-04T00:33:51.200Z -- solarwinds -- solarwinds
item.description: This vulnerability occurred due to missing input sanitization for one of the output fields that is extracted from headers on specific section of page causing a reflective cross site scripting attack. An attacker would need to perform a Man in the Middle attack in order to change header for a remote victim.
